text: Laurie A. Carter is the president of Lawrence University. Before becoming president of Lawrence in 2021, she was president of Shippensburg University. ==Academic background== Ms. Carter graduated from Clarion State College (now Clarion University) in 1984. She majored in communications. She got a Master of Arts degree in communications from William Paterson College in 1987. In 1993, she earned her Doctor of Law degree at Rutgers University. ==References== Category:American academics Category:Living people Category:Rutgers University alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Laurie Carter
